page.title: 07Entertainment (cont)
page.content: Littlebourne players stage several plays a year. This year{ Small Hotel}, {Sketches}by Ackbourne , a pantomime {Snow White}proceeds to improve lighting. There has been a circus on the recreation ground. Playgroup had a carnival, the recreation club had two activity days with displays of village activities + local history and conservation display. Wickhambreux has Morris Dancers each summer on the green, + the Summer Fair and Produce Show. All 3 villages have film shows some connected with church/chapel + music + choirs in the churches. Every Christmas the Salvation army sings carols round the villages as also do the Church choirs. Some streets have their own bonfire + fireworks on 5th November. Society AGM's have films, lectures or entertainment.
